headline.main: DEFENSE OF IRAN SEEN; British-Russian Agreement to Stem Nazi Advance Hinted

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, June 30 (delayed) (AP) -- British overtures to Russia for a new agreement that would establish Russian and British zones of influence in Iran and under which Britain's Northwest Frontier Army eventually would be shifted from India to Iran were reported today in diplomatic circles here.
abstract: Brit-USSR agreement for Brit defense of Iran in face of German threat hinted

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
